pages.text: The $(item)Rune of Capacity$() increases the capacity of the $(l:neovitae:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l) by an additive +20% per rune.

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:neovitae:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Rune of Capacity$(), increasing the capacity of the $(l:neovitae:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l) by an additive +40% per rune.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
